planets.name: Mars
planets.description: The fourth planet from the sun, is a cold, dusty place.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: The fifth planet from the sun, Jupiter is huge and is the most massive planet in our solar system.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: The eighth planet from the sun, Neptune is known for strong winds â€” sometimes faster than the speed of sound.

planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: The closest planet to the sun, Mercury is only a bit larger than Earth's moon.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: The sixth planet from the sun is known most for its rings.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: The second planet from the sun, Venus is terribly hot, even hotter than Mercury.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: The third planet from the sun, Earth is a waterworld, with two-thirds of the planet covered by ocean.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: The seventh planet from the sun, Uranus is an oddball.
